data:item.name: pcf2131 real time clock driver with demo app
data:item.display_title: PCF2131 : Real Time Clock driver on FRDM-MCXN947.
data:item.overview:
This example demo provides CMSIS Compliant APIs to configure different operating modes of PCF2131 RTC. It also provides APIs to perform below mentioned operations:
  • RTC Start
  • RTC Stop
  • Get Time
  • Set Time
  • Record Timestamps on Switches
  • Software Reset
